name: Zaacar
description:
Destruction and chaos on a whole new level is guaranteed when you enter the Zaacar : Ultimate Race of the century. Custom build the most deadly combat car ever devised and battle up 50 other players in a massive race where the winner takes it all. Are you ready to face the Zaacar?

Your objective is to build the strongest and fastest car ever to compete in the Zaacar race and win glory, fame and riches beyond your imagination. Carefully craft and build your car from the ground up with parts such as engines, wheels, weapons, armor, blades and much more to outsmart and outplay your opponents.

Get your hands on the best parts you can get before the competition gets hold of them!
If you're lucky you might get your hands on that epic engine or legendary chassis you've been looking for so long. Experiment with different car setups to your hearts content and try to get the best possible combos that work for your style of play and win races against up to 50 other players online. The last player still alive takes it all, are you brave enough to experience the thrills of the Zaacar?
